content.raw: this won't be needed anymore; out of respect for everybody that has written VRC code, I'll change the behavior of the hands so they match what the simulator is doing. Then there are less right/left-specific case switches strewn about all the code: since right-hand / left-hand gestures are typically perfect mirrors of each other by flipping the first joint, we'll just do that explicitly in the ROS driver, just like the simulator is doing.
